data.text:
19 back Charleston kick steps and ZERO disqualifications meet our new #ItTakesTwo Pro Challenge winner and Guinness World Record holder, Amy Dowden!

@dowden_amy https://t.co/RnbO98JB01

It’s a jam-packed #ItTakesTwo before the #Strictly Semi Final!
Our fab-u-lous Friday Panel stop by, plus a triple-bill Strictly Pro Challenge reveal! Who will clinch the top spot?

It’s all happening on @BBCTwo at 6.30pm ✨ https://t.co/J908aGaMBL
WHAT did the Judges say again? 👀 It's time for the Whisper Game part two! #Strictly https://t.co/JqZK42sxJc

Fleur & Vito swing by the glittery #ItTakesTwo studio tonight as they polish their Semi-Final moves.
And another Pro sets their sights for the top of the #Strictly Pro Challenge leaderboard!

All at 6.30pm on @BBCTwo! ✨ https://t.co/iIDnCREC66

We've reached the #Strictly Semi-Final, which means... it's double dances week! 💃 Join us in the Ballroom this Sunday at 7.15pm @BBCOne

👉 https://t.co/YnMBWVWHDz https://t.co/jia5wXKox1

Joining us tonight on the #ItTakesTwo sofa is Molly & Carlos dishing up the latest ahead of the Semi Final!
Plus, another contender steps onto the #Strictly Pro Challenge stage!

6.30pm on @BBCTwo ✨ https://t.co/GkwCS4lf1x

Tonight on #ItTakesTwo we say our #Strictly farewell to Kym & Graziano  💛
Plus, all the backstage action from Musicals Week!

All on @BBCTwo, 6.30pm ✨ https://t.co/ZIPcuAYGYu
The #Strictly Semi-Final is hitting your screens next Sunday and Monday! Send this to a friend who needs a reminder ✅ https://t.co/myjc8N6Jyl

Kym and her family can be so proud of her #Strictly journey, and she's gained an honorary member in Graziano 💕

@msm4rsh @GrazianoDiPrima https://t.co/JQ9kC6cZTH

Hamza and Jowita, you are safe! 👏
But Kym and Graziano now face the Dance Off 😢 #Strictly https://t.co/6sPjeECqzy

What a moment of relief for Fleur and Vito, they're through to the Semi-Final! 💖 #Strictly

@FleurEast @Vito__Coppola https://t.co/AEkTrV2rqS
The outfits, the moves, the absolute tunes! @TheCherShowUK brought it all to the Ballroom 🤩 #Strictly https://t.co/2HdcLMN8Ex
Oh no, the red light of doom shines on Molly and Carlos again tonight 🚨 #Strictly https://t.co/oYTgMz04ZA

The excitement on their faces 😄 You're heading to the #Strictly Semi-Final, Will and Nancy! 

@Mellor76 @Nancy_xuxi https://t.co/h5Exxrrnrx

When I'm through, then I'm through... and they're through to the Semi-Final! Congrats Helen and Gorka 🙌

@HelenSkelton @gorkamarquez1 https://t.co/iE42CQYhsc
Rockin' the boat and the Ballroom with a Guys and Dolls spectacular, it's our dapper Pros 😎 #Strictly https://t.co/Uye5vX68ZP
Send your favourite couple through to the #Strictly Semi-Final! https://t.co/TdYDgrsvPK

They've got rhythm and they've got that impeccable footwork! Who could ask for anything more from Fleur and Vito? #Strictly

@FleurEast @Vito__Coppola https://t.co/VgWkwtPevF

The power, the sass 👌 Helen's found her inner Sally Bowles on the dance floor with Gorka #Strictly

@HelenSkelton @gorkamarquez1 https://t.co/N37Nk8UCs2

Gorka looking for the kitty cat club.

#Strictly https://t.co/7tJh6S9ATo

Will and Nancy always deliver on emotion. And this Foxtrot gave us the sun, moon and stars! 🌟 #Strictly

@Mellor76 @Nancy_xuxi https://t.co/eGcp22IJ15

The perm, the legwarmers, the tune 👏 We'll remember, remember, remember Kym and Graziano's routine! #Strictly

@msm4rsh @GrazianoDiPrima https://t.co/vFWhCU4fr1

The spirit of the Samba lives in Hamza and Jowita! 🦁 #Strictly

@HamzaYassin3 https://t.co/kQtMXwgJfG

Molly Hart and Carlos Flynn razzle dazzled us with their Chicago Charleston ✨ #Strictly 

@mollyrainford https://t.co/pdv15yNZpp
The stars of the West End meet the stars of #Strictly 🤩 https://t.co/KURhCLaozX

Friday is the new Saturday.

#Strictly
Welcome presenter George Webster, dancing his way from @CBeebiesHQ to the #Strictly Christmas Special! 🪩 https://t.co/HpWfMuJZGU
RT @bbcstrictly: We're on your screens on Friday and Saturday this week, so set your reminders for #Strictly now! 🪩 https://t.co/LUBx2NOZmz

Preparing to put on a show in our Christmas Special, say hello to Girls Aloud star Nicola Roberts 👋 #Strictly

@NicolaRoberts https://t.co/g1f5QhUJl7

Fancy some lamb for Christmas? Get ready for Larry Lamb to hit the #Strictly dance floor! 🕺🏻

@larrylamb47 https://t.co/kggXtBqgge

Will & Nancy and Kym & Graziano pop into the #ItTakesTwo studio tonight, as we edge closer to the Quarter Finals!
Plus another hopeful faces the #Strictly Pro Challenge!

Back at our regular time of 6.30pm on @BBCTwo ✨ https://t.co/IxtMZQI9TP

Taking the trip from Weatherfield to Elstree for our Christmas Special, it's Corrie star Alexandra Mardell 🤩 #Strictly

@asmardell27 https://t.co/fs0nv19ISW

Joining us tonight on the #ItTakesTwo sofa is Helen & Gorka, dishing up the latest ahead of Musicals Week!
Plus, Manrara's Masterclass, and another challenger taps onto the #Strictly Pro Challenge stage!

On @BBCTwo at the earlier time of 6.15pm! https://t.co/uHtpuJyazE

The Ballroom is calling for @BBCR1 and TV presenter Rickie Haywood-Williams this Christmas 👏 #Strictly

@RickieHW https://t.co/TlI5L0I2zO
It's time to unwrap our first Christmas Special celeb! Welcome fab-yule-lous presenter and podcaster Rosie Ramsey to #Strictly 💃🎄 https://t.co/pVD1MnSu2R

Hamza & Jowita and Fleur & Vito grace our glittery #ItTakesTwo studio tonight, plus another contender takes on the #Strictly Pro Challenge!

All at the earlier time of 6.15pm - on @BBCTwo! https://t.co/Rcj2V2vAD7

Put your hands together for all the Musicals Week songs and dances 👏 Who could ask for anything more? #Strictly

https://t.co/eKW4Qod5vN https://t.co/nlmBDNsIOR

🔈 All the sounds you won't hear on a Saturday night. 

It's the #Strictly hidden mics week 10! https://t.co/W7p0sZsSRZ

Tonight on #ItTakesTwo we say our #Strictly farewell to Ellie & Johannes  💛
Plus! All the reaction from a show-stopping weekend as we head towards the Quarter Final!

All on @BBCTwo, 6.30pm! ✨ https://t.co/lPaQxiHNxK
We're on your screens on Friday and Saturday this week, so set your reminders for #Strictly now! 🪩 https://t.co/LUBx2NOZmz
Molly and Carlos are straight through to the Quarter Final! It's now Ellie and Johannes' turn to take on the Dance Off 🚨 #Strictly https://t.co/mjFepDcmdI

Shimmying their way through to the Quarter Final, it's Helen and Gorka! 🤩 #Strictly

@HelenSkelton @gorkamarquez1 https://t.co/CAFDYfXagF
Thanks for bringing this absolute banger to the Ballroom, @Tom_Grennan and @JoelCorry! 🎵 #Strictly https://t.co/rfGQGK95qs
Oh no! It's Dance Off time for Fleur and Vito 😢 #Strictly https://t.co/8ZTxkGP2Ik

Hamza and Jowita are safe and heading to the Quarter Final! 🙌 #Strictly

@HamzaYassin3 https://t.co/qoH4g8SJyX

@Mellor76 @Nancy_xuxi https://t.co/gDulCEV3Fh

Send your favourite couple through to Musicals Week! Vote #Strictly. https://t.co/YZdvsq3beQ

Terms and Conditions: you cannot vote for Gorka's shirt.

#Strictly https://t.co/SZNbtGsq9w

It's the confidence for us 🙌 Samba sass on point, Helen and Gorka! #Strictly

@HelenSkelton @gorkamarquez1 https://t.co/6Y5bSJkcq3

Leading man Hamza gave all the Argentine Tango power and passion with Jowita 🔥 #Strictly

@HamzaYassin3 https://t.co/SCNlTrFTyk

It's impossible not to get lost in Fleur and Vito's dazzling Rumba ✨ #Strictly

 @FleurEast @Vito__Coppola https://t.co/mr5kowjSI0

Come through Thelma and Louise! Ellie and Johannes drove their Jive right home to Elstree 🏁 #Strictly

@EllieJaneTaylor @jojo_radebe https://t.co/XA6p4qSCPV

Molly and Carlos brought that fearless Tango energy to the dance floor 💪 #Strictly

@mollyrainford https://t.co/odPbPTY4A3

The Charleston has never looked so stylish. It suits you Will and Nancy! 👔 #Strictly

@Mellor76 @Nancy_xuxi https://t.co/cNeRVDPmtL

The #Strictly Whisper Game returns...

Enjoy more Judges critiques tonight at 7.15pm 🪩 https://t.co/VwzT2rObM8

An action packed #ItTakesTwo awaits as Molly & Carlos grace our fab-u-lous sofa!
Plus, our glittering Friday Panel, another #Strictly Pro Challenge contender - AND! - a performance from Mark Owen!

Join us at 6.30pm on @BBCTwo! ✨ https://t.co/TiEG3IAFB8
The training room cameras really do see it all 😁 #Strictly https://t.co/hjOGNZArOO

Don't miss the very latest in training from Helen & Gorka on #ItTakesTwo - plus, two more contenders take on the #Strictly Pro Challenge!

Tonight 6.30pm on @BBCTwo  ✨ https://t.co/aJQgweAjrH

Tonight on #ItTakesTwo - it's the return of the Strictly Pro Challenge! Tune in to find out our first challenger bidding to tap into the top spot, as Craig inspects their every step...

@BBCTwo at 6.30pm! 👯 https://t.co/3b15clB4IA

Get ready for more fab-u-lous routines, hitting the dance floor this Saturday! 🤩 #Strictly 

https://t.co/hoxyqnwZ86 https://t.co/uARQzSg6CX

Joining us tonight on the #ItTakesTwo sofa - Hamza & Jowita and Will & Nancy with the Blackpool weekend lowdown.
Plus Clifton’s Choreography Corner with all the dance floor insight!

All at 6.30pm on @BBCTwo ✨ https://t.co/MQz4zIpHn1
It’s #Strictly’s secret mic time, Blackpool edition 🎤🎡🍦 https://t.co/j7efLOaGoK

From shy kid to #Strictly sensation. Tyler and Dianne made magic on the dance floor.
Team Ty-Di will be sorely missed ✨

@TylerWestt @dbuzz6589 @Rylan 
#ItTakesTwo https://t.co/7vY6wyWsBq

On #ItTakesTwo tonight we say our #Strictly goodbyes to Tyler & Dianne  💛
Plus, all the reaction from a dazzling weekend, when ballroom came home to Blackpool – 10s all round!

See you at 6.30pm on @BBCTwo! ✨ https://t.co/dfYmyIhQ9i
#Strictly has been life changing for @TylerWestt, and his iconic routines with @dbuzz6589 will live on in our history books! https://t.co/4Mk2F19cr0
Kym and Graziano, you are safe! But it's time for Tyler and Dianne to face the Dance Off 🚨 #Strictly https://t.co/QaKMWWWAn4

They went to Rio, and now Will and Nancy are going through to next week 🤩 #Strictly

@Mellor76 @Nancy_xuxi https://t.co/NJ5u76q6Av

Quickstepping straight through to Week 10, it's Helen and Gorka! #Strictly

@HelenSkelton @gorkamarquez1 https://t.co/o8zoSkpoCf
We'll never be over this @SamRyderMusic performance 💖 #Strictly https://t.co/qsZ08rxpTf
It's Dance Off time for Molly and Carlos tonight 😔 #Strictly https://t.co/S0itIuN8zB

What a result for Ellie and Johannes, they're straight through to Week 10 🎉 #Strictly

@EllieJaneTaylor @jojo_radebe https://t.co/dwjoouvNi4

Start spreading the news, Hamza and Jowita are safe! 🙌 #Strictly

@HamzaYassin3 https://t.co/V5TNGFiVHf

It was their destiny... That perfect 40 has earned Fleur and Vito a place in Week 10 👏 #Strictly

@FleurEast @Vito__Coppola https://t.co/1Dpc91UZx8
The significance of #Strictly and the Blackpool Tower Ballroom, set to the incredible sound of @SamRyderMusic in one moving routine ✨ #Strictly https://t.co/75MbfFCuZw
He’s The Voice! @SamRyderMusic joins us in the iconic Tower Ballroom tonight at 7.20pm for a very special performance 🎤 🪩 #Strictly https://t.co/toBJl50Hrz
Wow, well that was a Blackpool show to remember! Now make sure you send your favourite couple through to another week of #Strictly. https://t.co/jOKZCPKlYu

Let's go to Rio with Will and Nancy and those Samba hips! 🎉 #Strictly

@Mellor76 @Nancy_xuxi https://t.co/Q5mPqeGCFs

YES! The first 40 of #Strictly 2022 for THAT instantly iconic routine from Fleur and Vito (Beyonce and Michelle)

@FleurEast @Vito__Coppola https://t.co/rVhNatRu8F
COME ON CRAIG!

The moves, the outfits, the Destiny's Child Megamix 😱 We lost our breath watching Fleur and Vito! #Strictly

@FleurEast @Vito__Coppola https://t.co/Ck1ikNYxMv

The Quickstep, but make it Blackpool! Speedy and spectacular Helen and Gorka 🙌 #Strictly

@HelenSkelton @gorkamarquez1 https://t.co/BwqM6VBGK6

All aboard the Tyler and Dianne Salsa Soul Train! 🚂🕺 #Strictly

#Strictly https://t.co/FGn3GCXFSh

@HamzaYassin3 https://t.co/HduLgQeMRC
Bringing the #Strictly magic back to Blackpool and it feels so right! 💖 https://t.co/Q2i36aYCOh
Will Craig get that 10 paddle out in Blackpool? 👀 Find out tonight at 7.45pm @bbcone https://t.co/vi8Xn9osSc

Don't miss all the #Strictly latest in Blackpool training as Hamza & Jowita and Kym & Graziano grace the #ItTakesTwo sofa!

See you tonight at 6.30pm on @BBCTwo! ✨ https://t.co/5nzAq2zSSr
Two words... absolute chaos. It's #Strictly Dance Charades, part two! https://t.co/O6Gu9A24r0

Will & Nancy, and Molly & Carlos swing by the glittery #ItTakesTwo studio tonight as they polish their #Strictly moves for Blackpool.
Plus, it's never too early to quiz Shirley - and Anton! All your questions answered by our dazzling judges!

All at 6.30pm on @BBCTwo! ✨ https://t.co/HwiVeElmVq

Joining us tonight on the #ItTakesTwo sofa - Tyler & Dianne and Ellie & Johannes with the #Strictly weekend lowdown. Plus Clifton's Choreography Corner has all the insight into those moves on the dance floor!

See you at 6.30pm on @BBCTwo! https://t.co/kM1VBWSgwG

Destiny’s Child, Amy Winehouse, Rihanna… Our Tower Ballroom tunes and routines are ready to rock Blackpool! 🎢 

https://t.co/LwlkPhpdC2 https://t.co/NrOEsVjtgx

urls.title: Songs and dances: Blackpool Week
urls.description: The tunes of the Tower Ballroom
